strings: <voice_0x01000C55><se_def>Angelo: Hello again. Well, it looks like we'll be seeing a lot more of each other. I hope you don't mind me coming along.
<voice_0x01000C56><se_def>Angelo: I'm not doing this because Marcello ordered me to. I'm doing it for Abbot Francisco.

<voice_0x01000C57><se_def>Angelo: He was like a father to me.
That jester...Dhoulmagus...
He can't get away with this. And...

<voice_0x01000C58><se_def>Angelo: ...This place. I'll be glad to escape.
It's no hardship being asked to join you,
believe me.

<voice_0x01000C59><se_def>Angelo: And anyway, I promised you, didn't I?
I said I'd reward you for helping me.

<voice_0x01000C5A><se_def>Angelo: So, Jessica. From now on, I'll protect you.
I won't leave your side. Consider me your personal bodyguard.
